name: Madville+ (itch)
description:
Madville+ is a rogue-lite / arena shooter with ridiculous upgrades. It is designed to have short play sessions (20-40 min) and replayability

- Lots of wacko guns
- Lots of wacko add-ons for your guns.
- Lots of aliens
- Lots of dice and random effects
- Ridiculous challenges
